title: How To Wash Dirty Dishes with OxiClean
description:
Dirty dishes are a pain, especially when your detergent doesn't get them completely clean the first time -- or you get stuck with grimy, soapy residue. But maybe your dishwasher detergent just needs a boost from OxiClean -- because we know how to wash dishes.

Just add a squirt of OxiClean Dishwashing Booster to the bottom of the dishwasher, run as normal, and let it go to work for you cleaning your dirty dishes. They'll come out sparkling.

Do you ever wash your dishes before you run them in the dishwasher -- or worse, after you take them out? Let us know in the comments section.

Check our YouTube channel to learn more about how OxiClean gets the tough stains out, and cleans like no other. And click 'subscribe' to get notified when we post a new tip.

transcripts: OxiClean gets the tough stains out. Even the tough residue left on your dishes after you've run the dishwasher. Let me show you how easy it is to keep your dishes, glasses, and flatware sparkling clean with OxiClean. Dishes and flatware get stained with hard water spots and cloudy residue. So let's tackle your tough dishware stains. Just add a squirt of OxiClean Dishwashing Booster directly into the bottom of your dishwasher. The power of OxiClean supercharges your regular detergent... and breaks down residue that detergent alone can miss. Your dishes get clean the first time. Another tough stain tackled by OxiClean. It gets the tough stains out.
